plot: A comedy about an angry young Asian man who inspires an army of Oriental Brothers to rise up against their oppressor, The White Man.
title: Yellow Fellas
plot_es: A comedy about an angry young Asian man who inspires an army of Oriental Brothers to rise up against their oppressor, The White Man.
plot_en: A comedy about an angry young Asian man who inspires an army of Oriental Brothers to rise up against their oppressor, The White Man.
